text: Narrow may refer to: * The Narrow, rock band from South Africa * Narrow banking, proposed banking system that would eliminate bank runs and the need for a deposit insurance * narrow gauge railway, a railway that has a track gauge narrower than the 4 ft 8½ in of standard gauge railways * Narrow vs wide format, a style of displaying tabular data * Narrowboat or narrow boat, a boat of a distinctive design made to fit the narrow canals of Great Britain * Narrow (album),a 2012 album by Austrian musical project Soap&Skin; * "Narrow", a song by Mayday Parade from Black Lines ==See also== * Narro (disambiguation) * The Narrows (disambiguation)
title: Narrow
